function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research period for assessing efficiency of hand-washing stations","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the effectiveness of the hand-washing stations in preventing COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Extend the research period to allow for a more comprehensive assessment of the stations' efficiency","Technologies":"Smart sensors, data analytics for long-term monitoring","People":"Students, school staff, visitors","Owner":"Research institutions, school administration"},{"Description":"Increase in remote work leading to potential digital security risks","Impact":"Exposure to cyber threats and data breaches due to increased reliance on digital platforms for remote work","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, employee training on cybersecurity best practices","Technologies":"Encryption, multi-factor authentication, secure VPNs","People":"Remote employees, IT staff, company leadership","Owner":"IT departments, cybersecurity experts, management"},{"Description":"Closure of factories impacting long-term sustainability","Impact":"Disruption of supply chains, economic instability, and environmental impacts due to factory closures","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, investment in sustainable practices, policy support for affected industries","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, sustainable manufacturing technologies","People":"Factory workers, employees, consumers","Owner":"Government, industry leaders, sustainable technology providers"}]}
